problem_names:
lemma smc_0_components:
  shows "smc_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = 0"

lemmas_with (in \<Z>) [folded dg_smc_0, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  smc_0_is_arr_iff = dg_0_is_arr_iff

lemma (in semicategory) smc_smc_0_if_Obj_0:
  assumes "\<CC>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
  shows "\<CC> = smc_0"

lemma smcf_0_components:
  shows "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = smc_0"
    and "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>"

lemma smc_10_components:
  shows "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<aa>}"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = 0"

lemmas_with (in \<Z>) [folded smc_dg_smc_10, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  smc_10_is_arr_iff = dg_10_is_arr_iff

lemma smc_1_components:
  shows "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<aa>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = set {\<ff>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = set {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>, \<ff>\<rangle>}"

lemmas_with [folded dg_smc_1, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  smc_1_is_arrI = dg_1_is_arrI
  and smc_1_is_arrD = dg_1_is_arrD
  and smc_1_is_arrE = dg_1_is_arrE
  and smc_1_is_arr_iff = dg_1_is_arr_iff

lemma (in \<Z>) semicategory_smc_1: 
  assumes "\<aa> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>" and "\<ff> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>" 
  shows "semicategory \<alpha> (smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>)"
translations:
lemma smc_0_components:
  shows "smc_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_0\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (smc_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
     smc_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    smc_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
    smc_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
    smc_0\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. smc_dg smc_0 = dg_0

lemmas_with (in \<Z>) [folded dg_smc_0, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  smc_0_is_arr_iff = dg_0_is_arr_iff

proof (state)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence smc_0
 3. vsv (smc_0\<lparr>Comp\<rparr>)
 4. vcard smc_0 = 5\<^sub>\<nat>
 5. digraph \<alpha> (smc_dg smc_0)
 6. \<And>gf.
       (gf \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<D>\<^sub>\<circ>
                                (smc_0\<lparr>Comp\<rparr>)) =
       (\<exists>g f b c a.
           gf = [g, f]\<^sub>\<circ> \<and>
           g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c \<and>
           f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b)
 7. \<And>b c g a f.
       \<lbrakk>g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                         f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c
 8. \<And>c d h b g a f.
       \<lbrakk>h : c \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> d;
        g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                         g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                         f =
                         h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                         (g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> f)

proof (state)
this:
  vfsequence smc_0

goal (7 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vsv (smc_0\<lparr>Comp\<rparr>)
 3. vcard smc_0 = 5\<^sub>\<nat>
 4. digraph \<alpha> (smc_dg smc_0)

        g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>

                         h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>

                         f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c
 6. \<And>c d h b g a f.
       \<lbrakk>h : c \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> d;
        g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>

subsubsection\<open>A semicategory without objects is empty\<close>

lemma (in semicategory) smc_smc_0_if_Obj_0:
  assumes "\<CC>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
  shows "\<CC> = smc_0"

by (rule smc_eqI[of \<alpha>])
    (
      auto simp:
        smc_cs_intros
        assms
        semicategory_smc_0 
        smc_0_components 
        smc_Arr_vempty_if_Obj_vempty 
        smc_Cod_vempty_if_Arr_vempty 
        smc_Dom_vempty_if_Arr_vempty
        smc_Comp_vempty_if_Arr_vempty
    )

text\<open>
An empty semifunctor is defined as a semifunctor between an
empty semicategory and an arbitrary semicategory.
\<close>

lemma smcf_0_components:
  shows "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = smc_0"
    and "smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
     smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = smc_0 &&&
    smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ([[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, smc_0,
      \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> =
     []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
     [[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, smc_0,
      \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
     []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    [[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, smc_0,
     \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>2\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    smc_0 &&&
    [[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, smc_0,
     \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>3\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    \<AA>

unfolding 
    smcf_dghm_def smcf_0_def dg_0_def smc_0_def dghm_0_def smc_dg_def 
    dg_field_simps dghm_field_simps
subsubsection\<open>Empty semifunctor is a faithful semifunctor\<close>

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. smcf_0 \<AA> :
    smc_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>S\<^sub>M\<^sub>C\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> \<AA>
 2. smcf_dghm (smcf_0 \<AA>) :
    smc_dg
     smc_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>.\<^sub>f\<^sub>a\<^sub>i\<^sub>t\<^sub>h\<^sub>f\<^sub>u\<^sub>l\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                             \<AA>

proof (state)
goal (9 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence (smcf_0 \<AA>)
 3. semicategory \<alpha> smc_0
 4. semicategory \<alpha> \<AA>
 5. vcard (smcf_0 \<AA>) = 4\<^sub>\<nat>
 6. dghm_0 (smc_dg \<AA>) :
    dg_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                               \<AA>
 7. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = smc_0
 8. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>
 9. \<And>b c g a f.
       \<lbrakk>g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                       f\<rparr> =
                         smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>\<AA>\<^esub>
                         smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>f\<rparr>

proof (state)
this:
  vfsequence (smcf_0 \<AA>)

goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. semicategory \<alpha> smc_0
 3. semicategory \<alpha> \<AA>
 4. vcard (smcf_0 \<AA>) = 4\<^sub>\<nat>
 5. dghm_0 (smc_dg \<AA>) :
    dg_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                               \<AA>
 6. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = smc_0
 7. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>
 8. \<And>b c g a f.
       \<lbrakk>g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                       f\<rparr> =
                         smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>\<AA>\<^esub>
                         smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>f\<rparr>

proof (state)
this:
  vcard (smcf_0 \<AA>) = 4\<^sub>\<nat>

goal (7 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. semicategory \<alpha> smc_0
 3. semicategory \<alpha> \<AA>
 4. dghm_0 (smc_dg \<AA>) :
    dg_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                               \<AA>
 5. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = smc_0
 6. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>
 7. \<And>b c g a f.
       \<lbrakk>g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                       f\<rparr> =
                         smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>\<AA>\<^esub>
                         smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>f\<rparr>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dghm_0 (smc_dg \<AA>) :
    dg_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                               \<AA>

by 
        (
          simp add: 
            assms 
            dghm_0_is_dghm 
            is_ft_dghm.axioms(1) 
            semicategory.smc_digraph
        )

proof (state)
this:
  dghm_0 (smc_dg \<AA>) :
  dg_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                             \<AA>

goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. semicategory \<alpha> smc_0
 3. semicategory \<alpha> \<AA>
 4. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = smc_0
 5. smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>
 6. \<And>b c g a f.
       \<lbrakk>g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_0\<^esub>
                       f\<rparr> =
                         smcf_0
                          \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>g\<rparr> \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>\<AA>\<^esub>
                         smcf_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>\<lparr>f\<rparr>
qed (auto simp: assms semicategory_smc_0 smcf_0_components smc_0_is_arr_iff)

proof (state)
this:
  smcf_0 \<AA> :
  smc_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>S\<^sub>M\<^sub>C\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> \<AA>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. smcf_dghm (smcf_0 \<AA>) :
    smc_dg
     smc_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>.\<^sub>f\<^sub>a\<^sub>i\<^sub>t\<^sub>h\<^sub>f\<^sub>u\<^sub>l\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                             \<AA>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. smcf_dghm (smcf_0 \<AA>) :
    smc_dg
     smc_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>.\<^sub>f\<^sub>a\<^sub>i\<^sub>t\<^sub>h\<^sub>f\<^sub>u\<^sub>l\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                             \<AA>

by 
      (
        auto simp: 
          assms 
          \<Z>.dghm_0_is_dghm
          \<Z>_axioms 
          dg_smc_0 
          semicategory.smc_digraph 
          smcf_dghm_smcf_0
      )

proof (state)
this:
  smcf_dghm (smcf_0 \<AA>) :
  smc_dg
   smc_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^sub>.\<^sub>f\<^sub>a\<^sub>i\<^sub>t\<^sub>h\<^sub>f\<^sub>u\<^sub>l\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> smc_dg
                           \<AA>

goal:
No subgoals!
subsection\<open>\<open>10\<close>: semicategory with one object and no arrows\<close>

lemma smc_10_components:
  shows "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<aa>}"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"
    and "smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>} &&&
     smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
    smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
    smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>

lemmas_with (in \<Z>) [folded smc_dg_smc_10, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  smc_10_is_arr_iff = dg_10_is_arr_iff

proof (state)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence (smc_10 \<aa>)
 3. vsv (smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr>)
 4. vcard (smc_10 \<aa>) = 5\<^sub>\<nat>
 5. digraph \<alpha> (smc_dg (smc_10 \<aa>))
 6. \<And>gf.
       (gf \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<D>\<^sub>\<circ>
                                (smc_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr>)) =
       (\<exists>g f b c a.
           gf = [g, f]\<^sub>\<circ> \<and>
           g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> c \<and>
           f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> b)
 7. \<And>b c g a f.
       \<lbrakk>g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub>
                         f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> c
 8. \<And>c d h b g a f.
       \<lbrakk>h : c \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> d;
        g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub>
                         g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub>
                         f =
                         h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub>
                         (g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_10 \<aa>\<^esub> f)

proof (state)
this:

subsubsection\<open>Arrow with a domain and a codomain\<close>
subsection\<open>\<open>1\<close>: semicategory with one object and one arrow\<close>

definition smc_1 :: "V \<Rightarrow> V \<Rightarrow> V"
  where "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff> = 
    [set {\<aa>}, set {\<ff>}, set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}, set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}, set {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>, \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>"

lemma smc_1_components:
  shows "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<aa>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = set {\<ff>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}"
    and "smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> = set {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>, \<ff>\<rangle>}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>} &&&
     smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>}) &&&
    smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>} &&&
    smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>} &&&
    smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>, \<ff>\<rangle>}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ([ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set
       {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                 \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>} &&&
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set
       {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                 \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>}) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set
      {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>2\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>} &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set
      {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>3\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>} &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set
      {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>4\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>, \<ff>\<rangle>}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [[ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set
       {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                 \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr>,
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set
       {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                 \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set
       {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                 \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>2\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>,
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set
       {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                 \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>3\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ> =
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>

lemmas_with [folded dg_smc_1, unfolded slicing_simps]: 
  smc_1_is_arrI = dg_1_is_arrI
  and smc_1_is_arrD = dg_1_is_arrD
  and smc_1_is_arrE = dg_1_is_arrE
  and smc_1_is_arr_iff = dg_1_is_arr_iff

lemma (in \<Z>) semicategory_smc_1: 
  assumes "\<aa> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>" and "\<ff> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>" 
  shows "semicategory \<alpha> (smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>)"

proof (state)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence (smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>)
 3. vsv (smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr>)
 4. vcard (smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>) = 5\<^sub>\<nat>
 5. digraph \<alpha> (dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>)
 6. \<And>gf.
       (gf \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> \<D>\<^sub>\<circ>
                                (smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Comp\<rparr>)) =
       (\<exists>g f b c a.
           gf = [g, f]\<^sub>\<circ> \<and>
           g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> c \<and>
           f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> b)
 7. \<And>b c g a f.
       \<lbrakk>g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub>
                         f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> c
 8. \<And>c d h b g a f.
       \<lbrakk>h : c \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> d;
        g : b \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> c;
        f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub>
                         g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub>
                         f =
                         h \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub>
                         (g \<circ>\<^sub>A\<^bsub>smc_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub>
                          f)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vfsequence
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>}, ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<ff>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>},
      ZFC_in_HOL.set
       {\<langle>[\<ff>, \<ff>]\<^sub>\<circ>,
                 \<ff>\<rangle>}]\<^sub>\<circ>
